title: Scholarship - Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC
metaDescription: Vasquez Law Firm supports Dreamers with DACA legal services and the Dreamer Scholarship. Get trusted legal help and apply for funding today!
ogDescription: Vasquez Law Firm supports Dreamers with DACA legal services and the Dreamer Scholarship. Get trusted legal help and apply for funding today!

				FollowFollowFollow
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
					
	
	
	



			
				

				
					
					
			
		
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				Vasquez Law Firm DACADreamer Scholarship
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				Spring 2025 Scholarship Opportunity Now Open for Applications
			
				
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				For over 35 years, Attorney William Vasquez has been providing legal support to immigrants. The Vasquez Law Firm has successfully represented clients in a wide range of cases, including those involving family-based immigration, asylum, and citizenship. The North Carolina legal team also has vast experience helping young undocumented immigrants receive relief through Deferred Action for Childhood Arrival–or DACA.
Through DACA, undocumented students may be able to pursue a higher education in the United States. We understand how difficult it can be for many of these students to receive financial assistance when attending college. Through our Vasquez Law Firm DACA Dreamer Scholarship, we hope to make the dream of pursuing a college education more attainable for these students.
The Vasquez Law Firm DACA Dreamer Scholarship awards $1,000 to two exceptional students each semester to use toward their educational expenses. We are honored to help these students continue to fight for their American Dream.
			
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				The application deadline for the Spring 2025 scholarship is
November 27, 2024
			
				
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				Contact our scholarship team via email moc.mrifwalzeuqsav@pihsralohcs
			
				Go To Application
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				Student Eligibility Details
			
				
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				We are offering these two awards to Dreamers who are attending college or university within the United States. To apply for this scholarship, please review the following criteria to make sure you meet all requirements:
			
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				Applicant must be a DACA recipient pursuing a higher education
				
			
				
				
				
				
				Applicant must have a 3.5 grade point average or higher
				
			
				
				
				
				
				Applicant must be enrolled or planning to enroll in an accredited college/university for the Fall 2024 semester
				
			
				
				
				
				
				Applicant must be at least 17 years of age
				
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				Application Instructions

			
				
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				All students must fill out the application at the bottom of this page. Applicants should include their contact information, an unofficial academic transcript, and proof of enrollment if their transcript does not provide evidence that they are enrolled at an accredited university or college for the Fall 2024 semester. We also ask each student to provide documentation proving their DACA status, which may include a copy of their Notice of Deferred Action or Employment Authorization Document.
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				Additionally, to apply for this scholarship, students must submit a piece of art of their choosing. The art should depict what it has meant to the student to immigrate to the United States. This may include (but is not limited to) one of the following options:

Painting
Sculpture
Canvas Art
Pottery
Poetry (This must be submitted as the student reciting the poem via recording or video).

Please note, at this point in time we are not accepting submissions of digital art or paper-pencil drawings/sketch work.
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				The selected award recipient will have the option of their art being displayed at our law firms.
				
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				Evaluation Criteria Explained
			
				
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				We understand how critical any amount of monetary assistance is to a student pursuing higher education. As a team, we take our responsibility of reviewing your applications very seriously. Below, you will find the criteria we will consider when selecting our winners:
We hope to notify our two scholarship recipients via email by January 8, 2025.
			
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				Winning applicants must submit all requested documentation and information through our application form.
				
			
				
				
				
				
				Winning applicants must comprehensively answer the provided prompt within their submission.
				
			
				
				
				
				
				Winning applicants’ submissions must be original with clear ideas that depict their personality and experience.
				
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				DACA Dream Scholarship Winners

			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
			
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				Fall 2024 Winner: Jennifer Guzman Millan
The Vasquez Law firm is delighted to announce that Jennifer Guzman Millan is one of the Fall 2024 winners of our DACA Dreamer Scholarship. Jennifer is a graduate student at the University of Michigan-Flint.
			
				Read More
			
				Past Winners
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
			
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				Fall 2024 Winner: Citlali Jacqueline Flores Hernandez
We at The Vasquez Law Firm are excited to announce that Citlali Jacqueline Flores Hernandez is one of the winners of our DACA Dreamer Scholarship for Fall 2024. Citali is a student studying at the National Louis University at Chicago.
			
				Read More
			
				Past Winners
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				Contact Information:

Please send all questions and concerns to scholarship@vasquezlawfirm.com.
Our scholarship team can answer questions students and universities may have regarding eligibility criteria or the application process. The best way to reach our team is by EMAIL. To avoid any last-minute issues, we encourage all students to apply well in advance.
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				Application Form

				Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC has four convenient offices including Raleigh, Charlotte, and Smithfield, North Carolina and Orlando, Florida. We serve clients throughout surrounding areas including but not limited to Johnston County, Wake County, Mecklenburg County, Wake Forest, Durham, Chapel Hill, Apex, Knightdale, Cary, Garner, and Clayton, NC.
			
				
				
				
				
				FollowFollowFollowFollowFollowFollow

paragraphs: Through DACA, undocumented students may be able to pursue a higher education in the United States. We understand how difficult it can be for many of these students to receive financial assistance when attending college. Through our Vasquez Law Firm DACA Dreamer Scholarship, we hope to make the dream of pursuing a college education more attainable for these students.

The Vasquez Law Firm DACA Dreamer Scholarship awards $1,000 to two exceptional students each semester to use toward their educational expenses. We are honored to help these students continue to fight for their American Dream.
The application deadline for the Spring 2025 scholarship is
Contact our scholarship team via email moc.mrifwalzeuqsav@pihsralohcs

Additionally, to apply for this scholarship, students must submit a piece of art of their choosing. The art should depict what it has meant to the student to immigrate to the United States. This may include (but is not limited to) one of the following options:
Please note, at this point in time we are not accepting submissions of digital art or paper-pencil drawings/sketch work.

We understand how critical any amount of monetary assistance is to a student pursuing higher education. As a team, we take our responsibility of reviewing your applications very seriously. Below, you will find the criteria we will consider when selecting our winners:
We hope to notify our two scholarship recipients via email by January 8, 2025.

The Vasquez Law firm is delighted to announce that Jennifer Guzman Millan is one of the Fall 2024 winners of our DACA Dreamer Scholarship. Jennifer is a graduate student at the University of Michigan-Flint.

We at The Vasquez Law Firm are excited to announce that Citlali Jacqueline Flores Hernandez is one of the winners of our DACA Dreamer Scholarship for Fall 2024. Citali is a student studying at the National Louis University at Chicago.
Please send all questions and concerns to scholarship@vasquezlawfirm.com.

Our scholarship team can answer questions students and universities may have regarding eligibility criteria or the application process. The best way to reach our team is by EMAIL. To avoid any last-minute issues, we encourage all students to apply well in advance.

@graph.name: Scholarship - Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC
@graph.description: Vasquez Law Firm supports Dreamers with DACA legal services and the Dreamer Scholarship. Get trusted legal help and apply for funding today!
